title: Pixel 4a 5g - Apps can't access google photo
content:
Hi Google community,

I just bought the Pixel 4a 5g and I've noticed that all my apps that should have access to pictures can only access my local storage. I can't find a way to default it to Google photo instead. And, honestly, I though it would be the default option since it's a Google phone.

On my previous LG G7 One (with pure android) Google Photo was the default options.

It's kind of annoying if I want to share a photo. I have to open google photo, select the picture, share it (with the good app) and go back to my app after.

Any suggestions?

Best regards
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
